short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install CSP headers on arbitrary websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Casper Enforcer allows you to install and analyze Content-Security-Policy headers on any website.

If you need more advance CSP tools, checkout https://csper.io .
